snippet: For the first time in its four-decade existence the 92nd Street Y’s Lyrics & Lyricists series devoted a program to W. S. Gilbert.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews The Very Model of a Modern Major Lyricist: W. S. Gilbert and the Broadway He Inspired, season-opening program of 92nd Street Y’s Lyrics & Lyricists series.
lead_paragraph: For the first time in its four-decade existence the 92nd Street Y’s Lyrics & Lyricists series devoted a program to W. S. Gilbert.

headline.seo: ‘W. S. Gilbert and Broadway He Inspired’ at 92nd Street Y
headline.main: The Very Model of a Modern Major Lyricist
headline.print_headline: The Very Model of a Modern Major Lyricist
